section.title: customers by customer type Customers by Customer Type
section.para: To view Customers by Customer Type, select the "Customers by Customer Type" option from the "Displays" menu. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Customers by Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Customers for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose Customers you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select to show inactive Customers in the display.
Display lists Customers for specified Customer Type(s).

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
